ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(ISNEW() , CH_Initial_Case_Status__c = "Pending Vendor", AND( NOT(ISPICKVAL(CH_Type__c, "On Site arrival")), NOT(ISPICKVAL(CH_Type__c, "On Hold Period Start")), NOT(ISPICKVAL(CH_Type__c, "Solution Received")), NOT(ISPICKVAL(CH_Type__c, "Information Request")), NOT(ISPICKVAL(CH_Type__c, "Update")) ))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: If the 3P Vendor Case status is "Pending Vendor" then only the allowed Interaction types are :On Site Arrival,On Hold Period Start,Solution Received,Information Request,Update
